Ref: CXP005/2022
Closing date: 03 November 2022

The job position requires you to play an active role in project management support of multi-disciplined, project delivery work by facilitating the planning, scheduling and controlling processes for Electrical and Instrument Projects

Location: Jacobs, Durban

Main Duties include:

-Provide a high quality of service to the project manager and teams

-Review Contract documentation and highlight key schedule and tracking requirements

-Develop project schedules (levels) on MS Project

-Measure & track weekly progress and efficiency

-Highlight potential risks and roadblocks on an ongoing basis

Criteria:

-Must have sound ability on MS Project

-Must have min 3 years’ experience on Electrical and Instrument Project Planning Development and Reporting on MS Project

-You will serve 1 month probation

-Must have your own transport
